title: Tori Spelling and her '80s hunk' Dean McDermott are crowned king and queen at early Halloween bash
text:
She spares no expense when it comes to birthdays, throwing the biggest parties for her five children.

But for once it was Tori Spelling who got to celebrate, after she joined husband Dean McDermott at an early Halloween bash.

The two were invited to party by pals Nick and Vanessa Lachey, who clearly love a celebration as much as 46-year-old Tori.

Party time! Tori Spelling and her '80s hunk' Dean McDermott are crowned king and queen at early Halloween bash in photos she shared to Instagram

Posting pictures from the bash to her Instagram page, Tori wrote: 'You know what I did last weekend? We 80’s it upped and went to our friends Vanessa and Nick Lachey's Fast Times at Lachey High/Die Halloween Party'

Posting pictures from the bash to her Instagram page, Tori wrote: 'You know what I did last weekend? We 80’s it upped and went to our friends Vanessa and Nick Lachey's Fast Times at Lachey High/Die Halloween Party.

'We never go to adult parties and spend our lives in a perpetual state of kidville BUT I gotta say it was so fun to have a date night and to hang out with other fabulous mamas and papas. My girlie Vanessa knows how to throw a party ON point.'

The Beverly Hills 90210 star shared multiple pictures of the foursome.

Crowned! Tori was named the 'queen' of the high school themed party

Skirting the issue: It seems Tori isn't one for cleaning up

Photobooth: The mother-of-five doesn't get out much, she said

Tori explained: 'If you are wondering about costumes: Vanessa (wig off and her hair down at this point in the program) was Mr Hand & Nick was Spicoli as a Fast Times tribute.

'Dean and I were just a couple of loving the 80’s life party goers straight out of Valley Girl and inevitably King and Queen of Lachey High.'

Tori wore a huge flouncy pink skirt for the bash, sharing a picture of it discarded on her bedroom floor post-party.

'Vanessa Lachey my 80's skirt has been in this spot ion my room since the party Friday night... I'm considering making it into a lamp,' she wrote on Instagram.

Tori loves a good party, sparking no expense creating fabulous themed bashes for her children Liam, 12, Stella, 11, Hattie, seven, Finn, also seven, and two-year-old Beau with Dean.
description: She spares no expense when it comes to birthdays, throwing the biggest parties for her five children.
